greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=1, a(1)=2, a(2n) = A003961(a(n)), a(2n+1) = lcm(a(n),a(n+1))/gcd(a(n),a(n+1)).
comment: Each term is a squarefree number, A005117.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
xref: Cf. A023758 (positions where coincides with A260443).
Cf. A277701, A277712, A277713 for the positions of 2's, 3's and 6's in this sequence, which are also the first three rows of array A277710.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 27 2016
